snippet.title: The Lies We Tell Ourselves - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Coming to PC (First Episode: January 15th 2025)
Wishlist/Follow on Steam! ( https://store.steampowered.com/app/2176460 )
 
The Lies We Tell Ourselves is an episodic first person psychological action-adventure game with introspective/horror elements and a focus on subtle storytelling and atmosphere.
Explore, solve puzzles, survive and uncover truths buried deep within a castle of lies.

The trailer was made possible thanks to the talented:
Jacob Eccles - As the Narrator ( https://twitter.com/ThatOneArtsyGuy )
William Braddell - For the Original Score ( https://twitter.com/DeadDreams1991 )

#TheLiesWeTellOurselves
